doc.title: ICE: Beyond Cool
doc.plot: Created by award winning producer/director Tony Papa for CBC Television, ICE: beyond cool explores the hopeless posturing, isolation and angst of contemporary kids, grounding them in the explosive energy, fresh language and fast paced reality of high school life. Compelling, multi-layered, a vivid kaleidoscope of music, movement and hard-hitting drama, the film artistically captures an urban teen's struggle to fight the creeping unreality of her life and the increasing attraction of suicide.
